array.string: set -e TIMESTAMP=$(date +%Y%m%d-%H%M%S) ICLOUD_DIR="$HOME/Library/Mobile Documents/com~apple~CloudDocs/PetesBrain-Backups/critical-tasks" BACKUP_NAME="tasks-backup-${TIMESTAMP}.tar.gz" mkdir -p "$ICLOUD_DIR" cd /Users/administrator/Documents/PetesBrain.nosync tar -czf "$ICLOUD_DIR/$BACKUP_NAME" clients/*/tasks.json clients/*/tasks-completed.md roksys/spreadsheets/rok-experiments-client-notes.csv 2>/dev/null || true ls -1t "$ICLOUD_DIR"/tasks-backup-*.tar.gz 2>/dev/null | tail -n +21 | xargs rm -f 2>/dev/null || true echo "[$(date)] Critical tasks backed up: $BACKUP_NAME"
